/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their gray and white facades reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
